items.sentence: Let\'s hope we can avoid this problem in the future.
Tom had hoped that he wouldn\'t be asked to do that.
I wouldn\'t have done something like this last year.
I\'d appreciate it if you would turn out the lights.
I\'d be depressed if they asked me to quit the team.
I\'d really appreciate you not telling Tom about it.
We can\'t do that without Tom\'s express permission.
I wouldn\'t be surprised if they couldn\'t find Tom.
Tom died in Boston in 2013 when he was 30 years old.
Everybody knew there was something strange going on.
